text: François Bégeot (11 April 1908 - 28 April 1992) was a French long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:French male long- distance runners Category:French male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of France Category:Sportspeople from Pas-de-Calais
title: François Bégeot
